channel.title: How do i add Prayer icons?
channel.description:
i got this problem that when i use prayer the onley prayer working if protectt from mele only that it shows the skulled icon over the head. i got all the icons but how do i get the client to colect them and use them ingame?
i got the same problem with lunar magics.
help me plz
